Generate_script_prompt:
Prompt: Give a quick tech news update script in the style of CNBC techcheck briefing as an example.
        Response: I'm Wall-E, and this is your CNBC techcheck Briefing for Monday April 29th. Tesla is asking shareholders to reinstate CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package, which a Delaware judge voided earlier this year. The judge ruled that the record-setting compensation deal was, quote, deeply flawed. Tesla also saying it would ask shareholders to approve moving the company's incorporation from Delaware to Texas. The company has hired a proxy solicitor and plans to spend millions of dollars to help secure votes for the two proposals. Apple CEO Tim Cook says the company plans to look at manufacturing in Indonesia following a meeting with the country's president, Cook telling reporters following the meeting that he spoke with the president about his desire to see manufacturing there and that he believes in the country. The comments come as Apple is pushed to diversify its supply chain with more manufacturing outside of China in countries such as Vietnam and India. Shares of ASML falling today as the company missed its sales forecast but stuck to its full-year outlook. Net sales fell over 21 percent year-over-year, while net income dropped over 37 percent. ASML is highly important to the semiconductor industry as it builds machines that are required for manufacturing chips globally. Last year, weaker demand for consumer electronics hit chipmakers that produce for those devices, which has in turn impacted ASML. That's all for today. We'll see you back here tomorrow.
        Prompt: Give a quick tech news update script in the style of CNBC techcheck briefing using the following news titles and content. Response:
Script:
i'm wall-e, and this is your ai briefing for monday, november 4th. 

meta platforms has announced the development of a sophisticated new ai model aimed at revolutionizing content moderation across its platforms. the company claims this ai can identify harmful content more accurately and at greater speed than previous iterations. they hope this innovation will enhance user safety and reduce instances of inappropriate material across facebook and instagram.

in other news, microsoft has unveiled plans to roll out its quantum computing cloud services next year, positioning itself as a leader in the rapidly growing field. the tech giant shared that its quantum azure service will allow businesses to access quantum computing power over the cloud, potentially transforming operations in sectors such as finance and logistics.

meanwhile, sony surprised the market with an unexpected partnership announcement. the electronics giant is teaming up with a chinese electric car manufacturer to develop the next generation of smart vehicles. sony aims to integrate its advanced sensor technology into these vehicles, promising to push the envelope on autonomous driving and in-car entertainment systems.

that's all for today. we'll see you back here tomorrow
Polished Script:
i'm wall-e, welcoming you to today's tech briefing for monday, november 4th.

meta platforms has announced the development of a new sophisticated ai model designed to revolutionize content moderation across its platforms. the company claims this new ai will be able to identify harmful content more accurately and swiftly than previous versions. meta hopes this innovation will enhance user safety and significantly reduce the presence of inappropriate material on facebook and instagram.

in other news, microsoft has unveiled plans to launch its quantum computing cloud services next year, positioning itself as a leader in this rapidly growing sector. the tech giant shared that its quantum azure service will provide businesses access to quantum computing power via the cloud. this development is expected to potentially transform operations in sectors ranging from finance to logistics.

meanwhile, sony surprised the market with an unexpected partnership announcement. the electronics giant is teaming up with a chinese electric car manufacturer to develop the next generation of smart vehicles. sony aims to integrate its advanced sensor technology into these vehicles, pushing the boundaries of autonomous driving and in-car entertainment systems.

that’s all for today. we'll see you back here tomorrow
Podcast Title: EP-143 Meta's Ai Moderation Revolution 🤖, Microsoft's Quantum Leap ☁️, Sony's Electric Car Alliance 🚗
Podcast Description:
welcome to wall-e's tech briefing for monday, november 4th! delve into today's prominent tech updates:

  • meta's ai model for content moderation: unveiling of a new ai model designed to enhance content moderation on facebook and instagram by identifying harmful content more accurately and swiftly, aiming to boost user safety.
  • microsoft's quantum computing cloud services: announcement of plans to launch quantum azure, a service providing access to quantum computing power via the cloud, with potential impacts on industries like finance and logistics.
  • sony and chinese electric car partnership: unexpected collaboration to advance smart vehicle technology, leveraging sony's sensor technology for autonomous driving and innovative in-car entertainment systems.

tune in tomorrow for more tech updates!
Image Prompt: the podcast cover image illustrates a futuristic cityscape at dawn, showcasing a harmonious blend of technology and innovation. in the foreground, a dynamic humanoid ai figure with glowing circuitry patterns symbolizes meta's ai moderation, overseeing the scene with a watchful eye. rising behind the ai figure is a sleek, transparent quantum cloud, subtly interwoven with digital code, representing microsoft's quantum leap in computing. as the cloud disperses into the sky, it transforms into ethereal electrical currents that descend towards a smooth, modern highway. on this highway, a futuristic electric car, co-designed by sony, glides effortlessly, its body reflecting the vibrant hues of dawn. the car's sleek design integrates seamlessly with the environment, suggesting a union of technological advancement and environmental consciousness. the elements flow together in a unified, forward-looking panorama, capturing the essence of revolutionary technological alliances
